name: Who Will Save The Princess?
description:
Escape from the Demon King's dungeon to freedom!

In this game you are a princess trapped in a dungeon, waiting for your prince charming to rescue you, but he never arrives, so you decide to escape on your own!  Use your bow to fight the monsters and explore this amazing dungeon!

Controls:

Keyboard  = {

AWSD = Move player 

J = Fire arrows 

K = Interact 

L = Use potion 

I = Use Magic Shield

}

Gamepad = { (For players who are playing on Tic-80 mobile)

D-PAD = Move player 

X = Fire arrows 

A = Interact 

B = Use potion 

Y = Use Magic Shield

}

============================================================

Update 11/02/22: I'm happy to be releasing this game I've been working on for over 3 months.  Hope you like it =)
